meaningMnemonic: Remember how 縛る means "to tie?" Well if you tie something around someone's <kanji>neck</kanji> then it's called <vocabulary>hanging</vocabulary>. They'll probably die from it too, so it can also be <vocabulary>death by hanging</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a combination of the words 縛る and 首. Both use the kun'yomi readings, so just change the る to り and it's pretty simple!
